recommendations: Jitendra Solanki “Olivia is a amazing professional with sound knowledge of banking. Her expertise in lending space is top notch. During our interactions in HSBC I found her to be extremely polite, helpful, resourceful and creative person. Her ability to connect with people is a great a skill where she is able to share ideas and knowledge with new people easily. Olivia is a fast learner and picks things to quickly. She will add tremendous value to any organization. I wish her all the very best.”

Sarang Kanchan “I have known Olivia for a good eleven years. While we have remained connected as peers for a decade, we have worked on multiple assignments and competitions together while at Indian School of Business, Hyderabad. Olivia carries a 'never say die spirit' which when coupled with her commitment to logic and the need to review any business decision from the psyche of the customer , develops insights that identify and optimize the value drivers of any business. This helps her in resolving business problems across a wide spectrum- be it in the Information Technology change implementation at a phygital bank or as a product manager humanising collected big data or as a consultant solving marketing strategy conundrums for startups of various stripes. The quality of her implementation is a testament to the viewpoint that she brings to the table. I wholeheartedly recommend her and would love to work with her again! ”

detailed_profile.name: Jakub Chlad
detailed_profile.position: Head of Late Collections at Home Credit Philippines
detailed_profile.about: A manager with wide and various experience on emerging markets of Asia and post-Soviet area. Sales, financial services, mass processes, debt collections, administration of facilities, security and anti-fraud, legal and compliance, securitisation, debt sale, financial market, call-centres, product development, network management, incentives schemes – these are areas I have dealt with. What makes me valuable for an organisation is my creativity, freshness of outlook and ability of rethinking and redesigning processes. My strong international legal background makes me confident while operating in foreign legal environments. I have unique crisis management experience as well as outstanding ability of learning and adapting to the demanding work environment. In addition, I am skilled in mentoring and have got a couple of successful stories of helping my subordinates to achieve new level in their performance, maturity and career. Therefore, several times I was able to successfully run difficult projects with junior team who had no relevant experience. I have excellent command of time management.

recommendations: Daniel Štanc “Jakub joined my team during COVID to lead the redesign and ramp-up of our field collections. He brings a rare mix of legal expertise, international experience, and hands-on leadership - not just managing from HQ but personally engaging with field teams - while also driving strategic improvements in risk management, cost efficiency, and tool implementation. Jakub has the ability to lead from the front while deliver long-term impact.”

Edyta Skrobotowicz “I had a chance to work with Jakub on some HR project in India. Jakub is a person who sets goals, and achieves them. He doesn’t spread himself too thin. If there is a job to do, he does it. A great manager and a strategic planner. Self-confident, and goal oriented. When he starts doing the project, nothing can stop him until it is done according to the agreed schedule. At the same time he is a great motivator and a mentor to other people. For me personally - the real model to follow. I admire him for his determination and consequence in activity. Jakub is a person with a great dose of humor, too. It is a pure pleasure to know him and even more to work with him. It is a person from who I could have learned a lot, too. Thank you Jakub for this opportunity.”

detailed_profile.name: Dilip Manepalli
detailed_profile.position: Vice President I Global Digital Transformation & Innovation Leader I CIO Accelerator X Award Winner I Top AI Voice I Keynote Speaker
detailed_profile.about: Dilip is a visionary leader in Digital Transformation & Innovation, Analytics and Strategic Program, dedicated to shaping the future through emerging technologies. With a strong track record of driving large-scale transformation initiatives, he is committed to organizational metamorphosis. He has navigated a dynamic career path spanning various roles including entrepreneur, management consultant, mentor, and leader within esteemed Global MNCs and pioneering Start-ups. He brings 18+ years of versatile, cross-functional expertise across B2B and B2C sectors, including Technology, GCC, Consulting, Auto Retail, EdTech, FoodTech, FinTech and Telecom Dilip brings a wealth of experience from his previous roles as the Chief Business Officer for a leading fintech & India Management Team Member of a Global Top 5 Certification Body. An MBA alumnus of the University of London, Dilip serves on the Advisory Council of Harvard Business Review and is recognized as a LinkedIn Top AI voice. Beyond the professional realm, he finds joy in playing badminton and exploring new places and cultures.

recommendations: Kevin Knowles “I worked with Dilip during my time at _VOIS, and he was one of the most capable colleagues I had the pleasure to work with. He is calm, capable, thorough and diligent, and always produced work to the highest quality. He has excellent interpersonal skills and engaged with stakeholders across the business at multiple levels. No matter the project or topic, no matter the challenge, I could rely on him to get the job done and do it with a smile. I recommend him without hesitation, he would be an asset to any team.”

Pooja Kiran “Writing this recommendation for Dilip is a great privilege and honor. He isn't simply a mentor; but a catalyst for innovation. His exceptional talent, strategic brilliance, and leadership have profoundly impacted not just my career, but the entire organization. Witnessing his passion for leveraging Gen AI has been inspiring, and his unwavering support during challenging moments solidified his role as a guiding light. When our Project on Leveraging Gen AI into incident management project floundered due to an unclear problem statement and ambiguous success metrics, Dilip didn't hesitate to dive in. His sharp mind meticulously dissected the issue, guiding us towards a well-defined objective and measurable outcomes. Today, the project's resounding success stands as a testament to his strategic foresight and problem-solving prowess. Dilip's vision extends far beyond tactical solutions. His 'Eye Control' project, a marvel of engineering ingenuity, showcased his dedication to pushing the boundaries of Gen AI. Imagine, controlling your computer through eye movements! This ambitious endeavor, initially met with skepticism, materialized into a game-changer, revolutionizing accessibility within the company. This is the mark of a true innovator, someone who doesn't shy away from audacious ideas and possesses the talent to bring them to life. His mentorship extends beyond technical expertise. He possesses an uncanny ability to identify and nurture potential in others. I personally experienced this when feeling discouraged by unforeseen roadblocks. His unwavering belief in my abilities, coupled with his insightful guidance, instilled the confidence needed to overcome the challenges and emerge stronger. Dilip is more than just a talented individual; he's a visionary leader who inspires, empowers, and revolutionizes. His strategic acumen, coupled with his passion for Gen AI, makes him a force to be reckoned with in this exciting field. I wholeheartedly recommend him, confident that he will continue to contribute groundbreaking innovations and leave a lasting impact on the future of technology. Best wishes Pooja Kiran”

detailed_profile.name: Palash Sarkar
detailed_profile.about: With over 8 years of experience as a software engineer, I specialize in full-stack development, cloud engineering, and IoT solutions. I have successfully delivered projects across industries like renewable energy, underground cable trenching, and mining, consistently enhancing software performance and reliability. Key achievements include: * Reducing report generation time from minutes to seconds. * Ensuring high availability of software databases during system downtime. * Developing end-to-end cloud solutions to meet new regulatory compliance, including precise geolocation and depth measurement for underground cable trenches. Proficient in web application development, cloud architecture, and data streaming/analytics, I have expertise in Python, C#/.NET, TypeScript/JavaScript, Java, React, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Firebase, and Google Cloud Platform.

projects.title: Aalto - UNICEF Finland Product Development Project
projects.description: The product development project aimed to improve access to safe water, sanitation and hygiene in schools of rural Uganda through an intuitive sustainable product that is part of a larger system and simple to construct using readily available resources in Uganda. Carrying out intensive participatory and co-creative field research in Gulu region in the north and in the capital city Kampala the found its direction in solving hand washing and cleanliness related challenges. The outcomes were threefold: 1) a hand washing system with a clean-to-use water dispensing tap and grey water re-use system. 2) a latrine usage monitoring system 3) a clean school concept to activate the children in taking care of the school premises.Collaboration with:Aalto University, UNICEF Finland, UNICEF Uganda, Makerere University, and Swinburne University

detailed_profile.position: Fullstack Engineer | Software Test Engineer | MS CS Uppsala University | Ex Sprinklr
detailed_profile.about: 🚀 Fullstack Developer | Frontend-Focused | Passionate About Scalable Web Solutions | Automation Testing I'm a passionate and detail-oriented Fullstack Developer and Test Engineer with over 7 years of hands-on experience building responsive, scalable, and maintainable web applications. My tech stack includes React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, and Playwright, with experience across both frontend and backend development. My journey started in QA automation at Sprinklr for 6 years, where I honed skills in Java, Selenium, Cucumber, and CI/CD. Over time, I transitioned into fullstack development roles, contributing to diverse projects in both startups and academic environments. In every role, I prioritize clean code, strong collaboration, and continuous learning. From implementing UI components and optimizing workflows to mentoring junior developers and contributing to Agile teams, I enjoy solving real-world problems through software. 🛠️ Core Skills Languages & Frameworks: JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, Python, React, Next.js, Node.js, Express Testing & Automation: Playwright, Cypress, Selenium, Cucumber (BDD), Jenkins DevOps & CI/CD: Docker, Vercel, GitHub, GitLab, Jenkins, AWS EC2 Tools & Platforms: Prisma, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Figma, ShadCN, Wix Studio Methodologies: Agile, Scrum, CI/CD, Test-Driven Development (TDD) Soft Skills: Collaboration, mentorship, cross-functional teamwork, adaptability 👨‍💻 Experience Highlights Fullstack Developer – Bytespoke | Arrixa Jan 2025 – Present, Stockholm, Sweden Built apps using Next.js, React, Node.js, and Playwright Optimized workflows and contributed to multiple projects with a 15% increase in team efficiency Hands-on experience with AWS EC2, Docker, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and Figma Fullstack Engineer – Luday AB Sep 2024 – Dec 2024, Göteborg, Sweden Designed responsive UIs with Next.js and Tailwind CSS Engaged in pair programming and code reviews to boost quality by 15% Designed wireframes and mockups with Figma Frontend Developer – Stryda May 2023 – Aug 2023, Stockholm, Sweden Developed React and TypeScript components, implemented form validation Collaborated in a 5-member Agile team SDET – Sprinklr Jul 2016 – Jul 2022, Bengaluru, India Built scalable automation frameworks using Java, Selenium, and Cucumber Led QA for modules, mentored new hires, and integrated testing into CI/CD pipelines Integrated REST APIs and social media endpoints

detailed_profile.name: Amit Kurhekar 🚀
detailed_profile.city: WP. Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
detailed_profile.position: I Help Financial Services & D2C Brands Drive Growth & Reduce CAC Using AI, Data Strategy & Digital Marketing | $100M+ Value Delivered | Head of Data & AI | Kellogg CDO Executive Strategist
detailed_profile.about: I built a $100M+ growth engine by unifying fragmented data into AI-ready, compliant ecosystems for fintech and global enterprises. With 20+ years across Data, AI, and Digital Strategy, I’ve led transformation at global scale—working with CEOs, CTOs, and product leaders to turn fragmented data into intelligent growth engines. At MoneyLion, as Head of Data & AI Solutions (reporting to the Global CTO), I led the CEO-sponsored CDP and User 360 strategy—the foundational layer for our digital marketing, CX, and GenAI ambitions. This initiative: - Delivered 10X uplift in revenue through personalization and full-funnel automation - Enabled 2M new user acquisitions at the lowest CAC in our category - Achieved a 5X reduction in CAC via ML-powered audience segmentation and Martech integration Before that, at Yodlee, I built a scalable Financial Data Enrichment Platform using ML/DL techniques, enabling AI-driven personalization for global financial institutions. I led the deployment of several AI/ML solutions—spanning MLOps, anomaly detection, and smart categorization—driving over $8M in measurable value across products and partnerships. I worked with CPG giant Procter & Gamble for over a decade. At P&G I pioneered Industry 4.0 AI/ML adoption in manufacturing. In 2017, I piloted one of the industry’s first prognostics ML solutions on the shop floor—improving asset availability from ~60% to 85% (+25%). This made a financial impact of $15M Through this cross-industry lens, I operate at the intersection of CDO, CAIO, and CTO mandates—blending architecture, governance, and growth strategy into scalable impact. Today, I share my frameworks and field-tested playbooks through TransformTechX—a content ecosystem for leaders building the next generation of AI-powered enterprises. 📬 Let’s connect if you're shaping a GenAI, Martech, or growth transformation agenda—especially in Financial Services, D2C, or digital-first industries. 🔑 Core Skills: Data Strategy | Generative AI | AI/ML Architecture | CDP & Customer 360 | Digital Marketing | MLOps | Cloud Platforms (AWS, Snowflake) | Martech | Industry 4.0 | AI Governance | Fintech + FMCG Innovation | Executive Stakeholder Management

experience.title: VP Customer Success & Strategic Partnerships
experience.description: As a co-founder and director at Tezipay, I led the Customer Success vertical from the ground up in a fast-paced fintech environment offering business loans, POS systems, QR codes, and payment gateways. My core focus areas included customer retention, upselling, call center operations, and onboarding. Over 14 months, I built a ₹70 Cr loan book with just 4% NPA, while simultaneously forging strategic partnerships with top NBFCs and banks including Axis Bank, Arthmate, IIFL, LendingKart, and Razorpay. Post regulatory disruption, I helped pivot Tezipay into a digital marketing agency, securing major clients like IIMT University and Venkateshwara University.Key Contributions:Customer Success Strategy & OwnershipSpearheaded a scalable customer success framework and instilled a customer-first culture across marketing, operations, and product teams.Customer Journey Design & Lifecycle ManagementEngineered journeys tailored to onboarding, adoption, and renewals, increasing repeat purchases and account stickiness.Retention & Churn ReductionReduced churn by 6%+ through predictive engagement and proactive intervention playbooks.Farming, Nurturing & ExpansionBuilt client success playbooks that led to consistent upsell/cross-sell growth and improved ARPC.Strategic PartnershipsOnboarded and managed strategic lending relationships with banks and NBFCs to scale Tezipay’s lending portfolio.Tech & Scalability Implemented Zoho CRM, Jira, ChatGPT, Slack, and ElevenLabs to automate CS workflows and track lifecycle metrics at scale.Stakeholder LiaisonHandled escalations and served as executive point-of-contact for high-value partners and clients.Pivot ExecutionAfter regulatory disruption, helped reposition the company into a marketing services agency and led early revenue growth by acquiring anchor clients.Culture & TrainingConducted internal CSAT workshops and cross-functional alignment sessions to build a success-led growth culture.
experience.description_html:
As a co-founder and director at Tezipay, I led the Customer Success vertical from the ground up in a fast-paced fintech environment offering business loans, POS systems, QR codes, and payment gateways. My core focus areas included customer retention, upselling, call center operations, and onboarding. Over 14 months, I built a ₹70 Cr loan book with just 4% NPA, while simultaneously forging strategic partnerships with top NBFCs and banks including Axis Bank, Arthmate, IIFL, LendingKart, and Razorpay. Post regulatory disruption, I helped pivot Tezipay into a digital marketing agency, securing major clients like IIMT University and Venkateshwara University.

Key Contributions:
Customer Success Strategy & Ownership
Spearheaded a scalable customer success framework and instilled a customer-first culture across marketing, operations, and product teams.

Customer Journey Design & Lifecycle Management
Engineered journeys tailored to onboarding, adoption, and renewals, increasing repeat purchases and account stickiness.

Retention & Churn Reduction
Reduced churn by 6%+ through predictive engagement and proactive intervention playbooks.

Farming, Nurturing & Expansion
Built client success playbooks that led to consistent upsell/cross-sell growth and improved ARPC.

Strategic Partnerships
Onboarded and managed strategic lending relationships with banks and NBFCs to scale Tezipay’s lending portfolio.

Tech & Scalability
Implemented Zoho CRM, Jira, ChatGPT, Slack, and ElevenLabs to automate CS workflows and track lifecycle metrics at scale.

Stakeholder Liaison
Handled escalations and served as executive point-of-contact for high-value partners and clients.

Pivot Execution
After regulatory disruption, helped reposition the company into a marketing services agency and led early revenue growth by acquiring anchor clients.

Culture & Training
Conducted internal CSAT workshops and cross-functional alignment sessions to build a success-led growth culture.

experience.title: VP – Customer Success | Revenue & Lifecycle Growth
experience.description: Indipaisa was a funded fintech startup focused on building an all-in-one digital ecosystem for SMEs and MSMEs—combining POS, QR payments, business loans, GST integration, payroll, insurance, accounting, and marketplace tools into a single subscription platform.As VP – Customer Success, I led the design, execution, and scaling of the entire post-sales experience, while also aligning product-market fit through deep field research. I directly managed a 24-member cross-functional team handling onboarding, phone support, delivery operations, and renewals. My initiatives helped onboard and retain over 2,000+ SME clients across India and GCC, resulting in a 20%+ lift in recurring revenue.Key Highlights:🚀 Customer Ecosystem Design: Conducted ODI (Outcome-Driven Innovation) interviews with 1,000+ SMEs, shaping product design and customer workflows.🔁 Lifecycle & Success Framework: Built SOPs, CS playbooks, onboarding flows, and escalation protocols for seamless post-sales delivery.📈 Client Growth & Revenue Impact: Scaled the active customer base to 2,000+, with structured renewals, bundled services, and upsell strategy driving revenue lift.👥 Team Leadership: Built and led a 24-member success and ops team, setting up KPIs, quality benchmarks, and daily execution rhythms.📉 Churn Prevention: Developed automated renewal cadences and feedback loops to reduce voluntary churn and strengthen subscription loyalty.📊 Voice of Customer (VoC): Integrated CSAT, NPS, and usage analytics to surface client friction and influence product refinement.🤝 Sales Alignment & Upselling: Partnered with credit and sales teams to create value-aligned offerings and increase LTV.🌍 Localized Delivery: Adapted support and onboarding to regional languages and compliance standards to increase adoption in new markets.🧭 Strategic Reporting: Regularly presented client health scores and retention insights to leadership and investors to shape roadmap and risk strategy.
experience.description_html:
Indipaisa was a funded fintech startup focused on building an all-in-one digital ecosystem for SMEs and MSMEs—combining POS, QR payments, business loans, GST integration, payroll, insurance, accounting, and marketplace tools into a single subscription platform.

As VP – Customer Success, I led the design, execution, and scaling of the entire post-sales experience, while also aligning product-market fit through deep field research. I directly managed a 24-member cross-functional team handling onboarding, phone support, delivery operations, and renewals. My initiatives helped onboard and retain over 2,000+ SME clients across India and GCC, resulting in a 20%+ lift in recurring revenue.

Key Highlights:
🚀 Customer Ecosystem Design: Conducted ODI (Outcome-Driven Innovation) interviews with 1,000+ SMEs, shaping product design and customer workflows.

🔁 Lifecycle & Success Framework: Built SOPs, CS playbooks, onboarding flows, and escalation protocols for seamless post-sales delivery.

📈 Client Growth & Revenue Impact: Scaled the active customer base to 2,000+, with structured renewals, bundled services, and upsell strategy driving revenue lift.

👥 Team Leadership: Built and led a 24-member success and ops team, setting up KPIs, quality benchmarks, and daily execution rhythms.

📉 Churn Prevention: Developed automated renewal cadences and feedback loops to reduce voluntary churn and strengthen subscription loyalty.

📊 Voice of Customer (VoC): Integrated CSAT, NPS, and usage analytics to surface client friction and influence product refinement.

🤝 Sales Alignment & Upselling: Partnered with credit and sales teams to create value-aligned offerings and increase LTV.

🌍 Localized Delivery: Adapted support and onboarding to regional languages and compliance standards to increase adoption in new markets.

🧭 Strategic Reporting: Regularly presented client health scores and retention insights to leadership and investors to shape roadmap and risk strategy.

experience.description: Sales Leadership & Revenue Growth:•	Led a high-performing inside sales team, driving revenue growth from existing Adobe Creative Cloud customers.•	Identified, nurtured, and closed new business opportunities through strategic sales initiatives and data-driven decision-making.•	Implemented the "More Connect Per Seller" and "More Per Connect" GBD philosophy, optimizing customer interactions and maximizing revenue potential.Customer Success & Solution Adoption:•	Ensured that every client maximized their return on investment (ROI) in Adobe Creative Cloud by providing expert guidance and product adoption support.•	Assisted customers in seamless solution adoption, optimizing their product experience while guiding them to internal support teams as needed.•	Acted as a bridge between the customer and Adobe, managing onboarding, ticket management, upsells, and renewals to enhance customer lifetime value.Account Management & Upselling:•	Identified areas of growth and upsell opportunities within assigned accounts, driving expansion and long-term client relationships.•	Developed and executed account penetration campaigns (phone/email) to increase engagement and expand usage of Adobe solutions.•	Managed all customer communications with a focus on professionalism, etiquette, and timeliness, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction while working towards operational targets.Sales Process Optimization & Performance Management:•	Introduced a data-driven, metrics-focused sales management approach to streamline processes, improve efficiency, and enhance pipeline visibility.•	Strengthened sales forecasting accuracy, tracking key performance metrics such as lead qualification, conversion rates, and revenue growth.•	Maintained a structured daily cadence of leads, CTA interactions, opportunities created, and transactions closed, ensuring all sales targets were consistently met.Team Leadership & Talent Development
experience.description_html:
Sales Leadership & Revenue Growth:
• Led a high-performing inside sales team, driving revenue growth from existing Adobe Creative Cloud customers.
• Identified, nurtured, and closed new business opportunities through strategic sales initiatives and data-driven decision-making.
• Implemented the "More Connect Per Seller" and "More Per Connect" GBD philosophy, optimizing customer interactions and maximizing revenue potential.

Customer Success & Solution Adoption:
• Ensured that every client maximized their return on investment (ROI) in Adobe Creative Cloud by providing expert guidance and product adoption support.
• Assisted customers in seamless solution adoption, optimizing their product experience while guiding them to internal support teams as needed.
• Acted as a bridge between the customer and Adobe, managing onboarding, ticket management, upsells, and renewals to enhance customer lifetime value.

Account Management & Upselling:
• Identified areas of growth and upsell opportunities within assigned accounts, driving expansion and long-term client relationships.
• Developed and executed account penetration campaigns (phone/email) to increase engagement and expand usage of Adobe solutions.
• Managed all customer communications with a focus on professionalism, etiquette, and timeliness, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction while working towards operational targets.

Sales Process Optimization & Performance Management:
• Introduced a data-driven, metrics-focused sales management approach to streamline processes, improve efficiency, and enhance pipeline visibility.
• Strengthened sales forecasting accuracy, tracking key performance metrics such as lead qualification, conversion rates, and revenue growth.
• Maintained a structured daily cadence of leads, CTA interactions, opportunities created, and transactions closed, ensuring all sales targets were consistently met.

Team Leadership & Talent Development

experience.title: Customer Success Manager & Partner Network Manager
experience.description: QPay, recognized as Qatar’s #1 fintech, offered end-to-end WPS (Wage Protection System) solutions to SMEs—driving financial inclusion through salary automation, digital bank accounts, and physical debit cards. I began by managing India-based customer success operations and later relocated to Doha, Qatar, where I built the company’s largest-performing partner network, directly fuelling rapid customer acquisition post the FIFA World Cup 2022 announcement and new government WPS mandates. Key Contributions:International Success LeadershipRelocated to Qatar to lead regional partner expansion, resulting in the onboarding of 200+ active partners and acquisition of 5,000+ new clients within 12 months.WPS Client Enablement & Salary ComplianceOversaw compliance-centric salary file creation and disbursement for hundreds of SME and enterprise clients per Qatari WPS regulations.Customer Success Operations – IndiaManaged a team of 35+ employees in India, supporting onboarding, salary file processing, digital account setup, card delivery, and invoice renewals.End-to-End Onboarding & Payroll Card ActivationDirected issuance and activation of thousands of employee salary cards, ensuring KYC documentation, digital account mapping, and end-user training.Partner Network Development & Cross-Sell ExpansionExpanded revenue streams by cross-selling POS and payment gateway solutions through the same partner network across various business sectors.Service Automation & Process OptimizationAutomated internal services such as renewal billing, card lifecycle tracking, and support workflows—boosting SLA compliance and reducing delays.Issue Escalation & Technical CoordinationTriaged payroll errors, disbursement delays, and system mismatches by aligning product, tech, and compliance teams across borders.Training & Knowledge EnablementConducted live and virtual training for HR/admin teams to educate them on WPS regulations, digital salary submissions, and QPay platform usage.
experience.description_html:
QPay, recognized as Qatar’s #1 fintech, offered end-to-end WPS (Wage Protection System) solutions to SMEs—driving financial inclusion through salary automation, digital bank accounts, and physical debit cards. I began by managing India-based customer success operations and later relocated to Doha, Qatar, where I built the company’s largest-performing partner network, directly fuelling rapid customer acquisition post the FIFA World Cup 2022 announcement and new government WPS mandates.

Key Contributions:

International Success Leadership
Relocated to Qatar to lead regional partner expansion, resulting in the onboarding of 200+ active partners and acquisition of 5,000+ new clients within 12 months.
WPS Client Enablement & Salary Compliance
Oversaw compliance-centric salary file creation and disbursement for hundreds of SME and enterprise clients per Qatari WPS regulations.
Customer Success Operations – India
Managed a team of 35+ employees in India, supporting onboarding, salary file processing, digital account setup, card delivery, and invoice renewals.
End-to-End Onboarding & Payroll Card Activation
Directed issuance and activation of thousands of employee salary cards, ensuring KYC documentation, digital account mapping, and end-user training.
Partner Network Development & Cross-Sell Expansion
Expanded revenue streams by cross-selling POS and payment gateway solutions through the same partner network across various business sectors.
Service Automation & Process Optimization
Automated internal services such as renewal billing, card lifecycle tracking, and support workflows—boosting SLA compliance and reducing delays.
Issue Escalation & Technical Coordination
Triaged payroll errors, disbursement delays, and system mismatches by aligning product, tech, and compliance teams across borders.
Training & Knowledge Enablement
Conducted live and virtual training for HR/admin teams to educate them on WPS regulations, digital salary submissions, and QPay platform usage.

experience.description_html:
Led end-to-end operations for a B2C tech support firm offering remote desktop assistance, warranty sales, and one-time technical fixes for international clients across the US and UK markets. Scaled a team from 7 to 45+ professionals, owning both sales performance and after-sales technical resolution. Oversaw campaign execution, payments, and support operations while driving consistent revenue growth and client satisfaction.

Key Contributions:
Full-Cycle Operations Management
Directed all core functions including sales ops, technical support, human resource planning, payment reconciliation, and fund allocation to ensure seamless delivery and cross-team coordination.
Sales Growth & Revenue Impact
Scaled revenue to consistently achieve and exceed $10,000/month targets, eventually contributing to $4M+ in total revenue with a surplus of 16% over annual targets.
Team Leadership & Scaling
Grew the team from 7 to 45+ members, delivering structured onboarding, product training, and continuous coaching to optimize sales and support delivery.
Quality Assurance & Chargeback Reduction
Implemented feedback systems, quality monitoring, and dispute resolution protocols that minimized chargebacks and improved customer credibility.
Customer Experience Operations
Introduced initiatives like the One-Touch Assistant Program and 24/7 service availability, improving retention and increasing customer base by 94%.
Campaign Execution & Coordination
Collaborated closely with the marketing team to create high-converting campaigns, adjust pitch scripts, and target call flows—leading to a 120% spike in sales via innovative strategies like single-touch closing and value wedge pitching.
Payment & Compliance Oversight
Managed payment gateways, transaction compliance, and daily reconciliation to ensure smooth payment flow and minimal disputes.
